Parameters: DrmInfoEvent: The @B_android#drm#DrmInfoEvent_E@ instance that wraps the status information or warnings.
onInfo(android.drm.DrmManagerClient,andr.Description: Called when the DRM framework sends status or warning information during registration and rights acquisition.
onInfo(android.drm.DrmManagerClient,andr.FullName: public abstract void onInfo (DrmManagerClient client, DrmInfoEvent event)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback that receives status messages and warnings during registration and rights acquisition.
